post_title: WTB: raw low grade/beaterish Lumley & Seymour...
post_content:
I was looking for raw, low grade copies of the Lumley portrait and Cy Seymour portrait.  They can be creased with rounded corners, but I'm trying to avoid significant paper loss or missing chunks.

Please let me know should you have any available.  Thank you.
There are 3 Seymour poses Karthik are you only looking for one of the action poses? I have an extra batting pose if you're interested.
